verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He bought the whole field for joy. He bought the whole field for sheer joy. A man found a treasure, It was hidden in a field He bought the whole field for joy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paul was a Hebrew by birth. He left his land to inherit the earth. He sowed God’s word and when the seed gave yield In the hearts of a few, he bought the whole field.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A rich, young man searching for truth. Who kept the commandments the whole of his youth. Was promised a Kingdom if he gave away all But he didn’t have the vision of Paul.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Don’t keep your treasure in a room For a thief to steal or a moth consume. All our gain we count but loss We are rich in Christ who chose a cross.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The kingdom of Heaven we’ve found Is so like a treasure hidden in the ground. The ground is the people who long to be healed If you really want the treasure love the whole field.{/lang-eng}
